Crotale looked baffled at what was happening.  The hsip rocked again. 
He looked back and grabbed two large space mortars.  'Might need 
these' he thought to himself.  He walked out, and saw JetV. "JetV, 
where is PAcifix?"

"W-What are you doing here, Crotale?"

"Nevermind, somehtings wrong, I will explain later. LEad the way to 
PAcifix. " 

JetV turned and rand down the hall the large bot behind him all the 
way,  into the main haul.  "He's in there.  Pacifix, get up, wahts 
wrong with you."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Dion::
> 
> Dion growls at Grimlock's back, his spark still pounding with the 
energy that he'd prepared for a fight. Being a drunk for the last 
while of his life, he'd been in many barfights, and enjoyed them.
> 
> Dion turns his back and walks off, down the hallway, forgetting 
about Crotale. Rubbing his fist, he was surprised to discover that he 
felt respect for the Dinobot for responding to the punch that well.
> 
> I gotta get to know him, he notes mentally, stopping and trying to 
remember where he was headed.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > The fist smashed in to Grimlocks face as he turned around. It was 
the
> > first thing he saw. His visor went off, then back on in a few 
seconds.
> > Grimlock leaned forward into Dion's face. "PLEASE, don't waste my 
time
> > Autoscrap." Grimlock rudely said, as he turned his back on Dion, 
and
> > began to walk again. He shook his neck ,as the joint cracked. This
> > Autobot could hit, Grimlock thought. But not like a Dinobot.
